The image was published on Facebook on S: 2019, and has been shared more than 500 times.
The traditional Chinese text in the bott: Lai Chi Kok Road in Hong Kong’s Prince Edward neighborhood," while the text in the bottom right corner translates to "police officers want to rape me."
The logo of local Hong Kong media compan: CABLE can be seen at the top left corner of the image, along with a time mark indicating the video's timestamp.
The claim is false: as the image was taken from a local media outlet's video interview where the woman stated that police officers had pepper sprayed her boyfriend. The interview can be seen in a livestream video on i-CABLE's YouTube channel, along with other journalists filming the same woman as she spoke to the media.
